  • Method Details

    • upload

      public void upload()
      The invocation is reflected to the current GodHandler object following a state pattern logic

    • godClicked

      public void godClicked​(javafx.event.Event event)
      If the event is a mouse right click, a window showing the god's card and the description of this effect is showed. If the event is a mouse left click the invocation is reflected to the current GodHandler object that handles the event following a state pattern logic
      Parameters:
      event - the event that caused the method invocation

    • setSceneLogin

      public void setSceneLogin() throws java.io.IOException
      Changes the current scene with the Login one
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • confirmClicked

      public void confirmClicked​(javafx.event.Event event) throws java.io.IOException
      The invocation is reflected to the current GodHandler object following a state pattern logic
      Parameters:
      event - the event that caused the method invocation
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • helperClicked

      public void helperClicked​(javafx.event.Event event) throws java.io.IOException
      The invocation is reflected to the current GodHandler object following a state pattern logic
      Parameters:
      event - the event that caused the method invocation
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • buttonPressed

      public void buttonPressed​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)

      Parameters:
      event - the event that caused the method invocation

    • setSceneGodInput

      public void setSceneGodInput​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> chosenGods, boolean isChoosing) throws java.io.IOException
      Changes the current scene and updates the GodHandler attribute with a GodInput object following a state pattern logic
      Parameters:
      chosenGods - the gods chosen for this match
      isChoosing - true is the player is chosing is god, false if he is spectating
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • setSceneStarterSelection

      public void setSceneStarterSelection​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> players) throws java.io.IOException
      Opens a popup where the player is asked to choose the starting player for the match
      Parameters:
      players - list of players for this match
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • setSceneHelperPopup

      public void setSceneHelperPopup​(javafx.event.Event event, java.util.List<java.lang.String> message) throws java.io.IOException
      Opens a popup that shows some tips on how to use the GUI
      Parameters:
      event - the event that caused the method invocation
      message - the messages that are going to be written in the popup
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

      Parameters:

    • setGodEffects

      public void setGodEffects​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> godEffects)
      Converts a List of Strings in the format "GodName;godeffect" in Map where GodName is the key and the effect is the object
      Parameters:
      godEffects - the list to be converted
